hero.title: Hedge Calendar Risk. Custody You Can Trust.

problem.title: What is Calendar Risk?
problem.subtitle: When FX spot moves between your trade date and settlement date, your realized KRW amount can swing dramatically.

example.title: Example: Korean Exporter
example.scenario: Your client agrees to pay $1M for goods. Settlement is T+2.
example.solution: Forward hedging locks in ₩1,300/USD regardless of spot movement.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: End-to-end workflow from onboarding to settlement

steps.title: Custody & KYC
steps.description: Open segregated custody account. Complete KYC/AML with licensed counterparties.

steps.title: Price & Quote
steps.description: Request forward quotes from licensed FX dealers. View transparent pricing and basis.

steps.title: SEAL Approval
steps.description: Dual-control policy engine reviews trade parameters. Immutable audit log with hash-chain.

steps.title: Route & Execute
steps.description: Order routed to licensed counterparty. KustodyFi never holds client funds in transit.

steps.title: Settle & Audit
steps.description: Settlement on-chain or via bank rails. Daily Merkle proofs and monthly audit pack export.

sealCustody.title: SEAL-Grade Custody & Controls

features.title: Policy Engine

features.title: Alerts & Limits

features.title: Monthly Audit Pack
features.description: Exportable compliance reports with full transaction history, policy adherence, and cryptographic proofs.
